movies.title: Les Misérables
movies.plot: Jean Valjean, a Frenchman imprisoned for stealing bread, must flee a police officer named Javert. The pursuit consumes both men's lives, and soon Valjean finds himself in the midst of the student revolutions in France.
movies.simplePlot: Jean Valjean, a Frenchman imprisoned for stealing bread, must flee a police officer named Javert. The pursuit consumes both men's lives, and soon Valjean finds himself in the midst of the ...

biography.bio: Christopher Adamson is an actor, known for Les Misérables (1998), Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End (2007) and Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest (2006).
biography.name: Christopher Adamson

biography.bio: Tim Barlow was born on January 18, 1936 in Blackpool, Lancashire, England as Michael John Leigh Barlow. He is an actor, known for Les Misérables (1998), Hot Fuzz (2007) and 10,000 BC (2008).
biography.name: Tim Barlow

biography.bio: Prolific British character actor, adept at eccentric or whimsical impersonations, particularly of Dickensian characters. The son of law society president Sir Dingwall Bateson, he won a scholarship to Wadham College, where he trained for acting with the Oxford University Dramatic Society. Straight out of college, he was handpicked by Alberto Cavalcanti for the role of Lord Verisopht in the Ealing production of The Life and Adventures of Nicholas Nickleby (1947). Bateson made his theatrical debut at the Old Vic the following year in "Twelfth Night". He was highly acclaimed for his performance as Lucky in "Waiting for Godot", which he first performed at the Arts Theatre in London in 1955. Nothing, if not versatile, Bateson turned his considerable talents to a wide variety of diverse assignments, ranging from Shakespearean classics (Richard III (1955)) to social drama The Outsider (1948)) and lightweight farce (The Mouse That Roared (1959)). He was a longstanding member of the BBC radio repertory company and latterly much in demand for voice-over work, which included providing the voice of Kreacher in Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2007). Television saw him in small roles as scientists, police officers, clerks and the like, in numerous popular shows from The Avengers (1961) and Z Cars (1962) to Doctor Who (1963).
biography.name: Timothy Bateson

biography.bio: Veronika Bendová is an actress, known for Les Misérables (1998).
biography.name: Veronika Bendová

biography.bio: David Birkin was born in 1977 as David Tristan Birkin. He is an actor, known for Les Misérables (1998), Sylvia (2003) and Impromptu (1991).
biography.name: David Birkin

biography.placeOfBirth: Annedal, Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden
biography.bio: Reine Brynolfsson was born on January 15, 1953 in Annedal, Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden as Reine Claes-Göran Brynolfsson. He is an actor, known for Les Misérables (1998), Kitchen stories - chroniques de cuisine (2003) and A Song for Martin (2001).
biography.name: Reine Brynolfsson

biography.bio: Patsy Byrne was born on July 13, 1933 in Ashford, Kent, England as Patricia Byrne. She was an actress, known for Les Misérables (1998), Watching (1987) and Blackadder Back & Forth (1999). She was married to Patrick John Seccombe. She died on June 17, 2014 in Denville Hall, Northwood, London, England.
biography.name: Patsy Byrne

biography.bio: Kathleen Byron trained for the stage at the Bristol Old Vic Theatre School, beginning her work in the movies soon after she finished her training. Her early work with Michael Powell made her name in the UK. She went to Hollywood in the 1940s and 50s but found it difficult to break into the US productions. Mainly because although everyone greatly admired her performance as Sister Ruth in Black Narcissus (1947), she was typecast and only expected to be able to play neurotic characters.
biography.name: Kathleen Byron

biography.bio: Václav Chalupa was born on July 12, 1974 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for xXx (2002), Les Misérables (1998) and Hannibal Rising (2007).
biography.name: Václav Chalupa

biography.bio: Ian Cregg is an actor, known for Les Misérables (1998), Adam & Paul (2004) and An Everlasting Piece (2000).
biography.name: Ian Cregg

biography.bio: Ben Crompton was born in 1974 in Stockport, Greater Manchester, England. He is known for his work on Before I Go to Sleep (2014), Game of Thrones (2011) and 102 Dalmatians (2000). He has been married to Liv Lorent since 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Ben Crompton

biography.placeOfBirth: Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: New Yorker Claire Catherine Danes was born in Manhattan, the daughter of Carla (Hall), a day-care provider and artist, and Christopher Danes, a computer consultant and photographer. She has an older brother, Asa. Her paternal grandfather, Gibson Andrew Danes, was a Dean of the Yale School of Art and Architecture. She is of mostly German and British Isles descent. Claire was educated at Dalton School, New York, The New York City Lab School for Collaborative Studies, The Professional Performing Arts School and Lycée Français de Los Angeles. From 1998, she attended Yale University, studying psychology, but dropped out after two years to concentrate on her acting career. Danes first came to major public attention when she appeared as "Angela Chase" in My So-Called Life (1994). She won an Emmy nomination and a Golden Globe award for this performance. A successful film career followed, including the role of "Juliet", opposite Leonardo DiCaprio, in Baz Luhrmann's Romeo + Juliet (1996). She continued acting in such varied project as The Hours (2002), Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines (2003) and Stardust (2007). In 2010, she appeared in the HBO Production, Temple Grandin (2010), playing the title character. She received huge critical acclaim for the role, and won an Emmy, Golden Globe and Screen Actors Guild Award for her performance. Since 2011, she has starred on the SHOWTIME series Homeland (2011), receiving great critical acclaim and winning Emmys and Golden Globes.
biography.name: Claire Danes

biography.bio: Zdenek David was born on July 12, 1955 in Trutnov, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Les Misérables (1998), Septej (1996) and Dárecek (1984). He died on March 16, 2009 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Zdenek David

biography.bio: Paola Dionisotti was born in 1946 in Turin, Italy. She is an actress, known for Florence Foster Jenkins (2016), Les Misérables (1998) and Intimité (2001).
biography.name: Paola Dionisotti

biography.bio: Edna Doré was born on May 31, 1921 in Bromley, Kent, England as Edna Lillian Gorring. She was an actress, known for Nil by Mouth (1997), High Hopes (1988) and Les Misérables (1998). She was married to Alexander Doré. She died on April 11, 2014 in Sussex, England.
biography.name: Edna Doré
